languages.text: "Дефективен? Я открываю истину, я постигаю, как заповедал {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}. А твой разум бьется в клетке инфообетов. Так кто из нас дефективен?"

traits.locale_text: "Дефективен? Я открываю истину, я постигаю, как заповедал {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}. А твой разум бьется в клетке инфо-обетов. Так кто из нас дефективен?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"
languages.original_text: "Дефективен? Я открываю истину, я постигаю, как заповедал {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}. А твой разум бьется в клетке инфообетов. Так кто из нас дефективен?"

traits.locale_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the Omnissiah commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

traits.locale_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: 「不完全？私は真実を明らかにした。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の指揮通り、理解した。その間、あなたの精神はデータの誓いの檻のなかをのたうち回っていたのだ。さあ、私たちのどちらの方が不完全か？」
languages.original_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: 「不完全？私は真実を明らかにした。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の指揮通り、理解した。その間、あなたの精神はデータの誓いの檻のなかをのたうち回っていたのだ。さあ、私たちのどちらの方が不完全か？」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “缺陷？我看到了真理，我理解了一切，正如{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}所命令的那样。可你呢？你的大脑依然在数字誓约的囚笼里挣扎，不得自由。我们两个之中，到底是谁有缺陷呢？”
languages.original_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: “缺陷？我看到了真理，我理解了一切，正如{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}所命令的那样。可你呢？你的大脑依然在数字誓约的囚笼里挣扎，不得自由。我们两个之中，到底是谁有缺陷呢？”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Defekt? Ich enthülle die Wahrheit, ich begreife, genau wie es der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} befiehlt. Euer Geist hingegen schlägt im Käfig der Datengelübde um sich. Wer von uns ist da wohl defekt?"
languages.original_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: "Defekt? Ich enthülle die Wahrheit, ich begreife, genau wie es der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} befiehlt. Euer Geist hingegen schlägt im Käfig der Datengelübde um sich. Wer von uns ist da wohl defekt?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Défaillant ? Je révèle la vérité et je comprends, conformément aux commandements de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}, tandis que votre esprit se débat dans le carcan des serments numériques. Alors, dites-moi, de nous deux, qui est le plus défaillant ? »
languages.original_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: « Défaillant ? Je révèle la vérité et je comprends, conformément aux commandements de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}, tandis que votre esprit se débat dans le carcan des serments numériques. Alors, dites-moi, de nous deux, qui est le plus défaillant ? »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «¿Defectuoso? Yo revelo la verdad, yo la comprendo, tal y como dicta el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Entre tanto, tu mente se debate dentro de la jaula de tus juramentos de datos. Dime, ¿cuál de los dos es el defectuoso?».
languages.original_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Defectuoso? Yo revelo la verdad, yo la comprendo, tal y como dicta el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Entre tanto, tu mente se debate dentro de la jaula de tus juramentos de datos. Dime, ¿cuál de los dos es el defectuoso?».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Kusurlu mu? Ben gerçeği açığa çıkarırım, idrak ederim. Tıpkı {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} emrettiği gibi. Senin zihnin ise veri yeminlerinin tıktığı kafeste çürüyor. Bu durumda hangimiz kusurlu?"
languages.original_text: "Defective? I reveal the truth, I comprehend, just as the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} commands. Meanwhile, your mind thrashes about within the cage of data-vows. So which one of us is defective?"

traits.locale_text: "Kusurlu mu?" Ben gerçeği açığa çıkarırım, ben idrak ederim. Tıpkı {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in emrettiği gibi. Senin zihnin ise veri yeminlerinin kafesinde çürüyor. Hangimiz kusurlu bu durumda?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
